channel.title: HELP PLEASE PRAYER POT! (317 delta)

item.title: HELP PLEASE PRAYER POT! (317 delta)
item.dc:creator: @swich9999999 swich9999999
item.description:
@swich9999999 wrote:

ok the max level for all skills is 120… but when you use the prayer portion when it is above level 100 it dosent work (like say you are 34/100) it wont give you any more prayer… how do i make it give back the prayer (works for levels <=99) here is the code i got from “potions.java” (317 delta)

[code] case 2434:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.setAnimation(0x33D);

FIXED this is what to do -
go into client.java and find

  [code]} else if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) >= 96 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) <=

  1. {
    playerLevel[5] += 31;

    }[/code]

now switch this to

[code] } else if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) >= 96 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) <=

  1. {
    playerLevel[5] += 31;

    }[/code]

       c.sM("You drink some of your restore prayer potion.");
   c.sM("You have 3 doses of potion left.");

c.deleteItem(2434, slot, 1);
c.addItem(139, 1);
c.prayerRestore();
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[5] + “”, 4012);
c.sendFrame126(“Prayer: “+c.playerLevel[5]+”/”+c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5])+"", 687);
break;[/code]

Read full topic
